bio: Rob Rohr has been a developer for the School of Business Administration at the University of Vermont for the past 14 years. Rob has dipped his coding toe in the seas of content management, ink/touch development, mobile development, PowerShell and functional programming and likes to share the programming weirdness that he has encountered along the way. Rob can be found on Twitter as @[rob_rohr](http://twitter.com/rob_rohr).
